column5: Anyone have experience with a trip here in August ? I've heard that possibly less walleye are caught, but they are bigger - and... they are all concentrated in the N. part of the lake where the water is deeper. Any experiences? Thanks.

Was there on August 21st to the 25th. Fishing was outstanding for numbers but we didn't catch any large one. All around 19" to 24". We were fishing in the northern part of the lake. Lasst summer it was a particular summer so next year you may catch a lot of big one. Not every year are the same.
